alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Montgomery, northwestern Chambers, southwestern Liberty and eastern Harris Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1200 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kingwood to Bush Intercontinental Airport to Meyerland Area. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Baytown, Deer Park, South Houston, Bellaire, Humble, West University Place, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Liberty, Dayton, Beach City, Cloverleaf, Downtown Houston, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Kingwood, Second Ward, Greater Heights, Neartown / Montrose and Barrett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
